column1: Little Goat Diner////Why would I talk about a bathroom? Because like it or not
column2: the state of a restaurant's bathroom says a lot about their cleanliness as a restaurant overall. I am pleased to say that it's great; bathroom is clean
column4: and is stocked with plenty of toilet paper. Basics
column8: and three that just say restroom (which is sneakily progressive and fabulous). The women's has a changing station
